Projects.Name: Creator-fan social media platform
Projects.Description: Played a key role in designing, developing, and testing a social platform that redefined interactions between content creators and their fans by introducing features like exclusive content feeds and direct messaging.

Projects.Name: Sport events management system
Projects.Description: Participated in the design, development, and testing of a platform dedicated to sports events, enabling users to host their own events, join ongoing activities, and monitor their performance seamlessly.

Projects.Name: Blood donation coordination hub
Projects.Description: Assisted in the design, development, and testing of a platform simplifying the blood donation process, allowing users to schedule donations, view donation history, and find nearby donation centers effortlessly.

Projects.Name: Installation management network
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a comprehensive platform aimed at facilitating connections between manufacturers and retailers with a wide variety of installation resources (i.e. retail store displays).

Projects.Name: Technical security solution
Projects.Description: Worked on the design, development, and testing of a security platform integrating IoT devices like surveillance cameras, fire detection systems, and access control units for enhanced security management.

Projects.Name: Conference device management tool
Projects.Description: Helped design, develop, and test a platform tailored for managing conference equipment such as microphones and speakers, ensuring streamlined device coordination during events.

As a QA Associate at Nanobit, I was responsible for conducting feature software testing, meticulously searching for bugs, and accurately reproducing reported issues. I excelled in writing detailed bug reports, providing comprehensive information to aid in the resolution process. Additionally, I played a crucial role in giving feedback on software functionalities, contributing to the overall improvement of product quality.

As a QA Associate at UniqCast, I conducted black box testing, both manual and automatic, ensuring the quality and functionality of software products. Additionally, I provided customer support, addressing queries and issues to enhance user experience. I also engaged in some QML programming, contributing directly to software development. Furthermore, I played a role in writing technical documentation, providing valuable resources for users and internal teams.
